div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1449 Asia Minor ?, 1950 Burial: c. 220 B.C. (M) Contents: 7+ AV Imit. Alexander III: 2 st. Lysimachus: 2 st. (Byzantium) Imit. Lysimachus: 1 st. Imit. Seleucus I: 1 st. Seleucus II: 1 st. (unc. mint) Disposition: dispersed Information from E. S. G. Robinson
